DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study investigate resveratrol supplementation improve overall muscle-specific insulin sensitivity type 2 diabetic patient . As secondary objective investigator want investigate whether improved insulin sensitivity attribute improved muscle mitochondrial oxidative capacity reduce intrahepatic cardiac lipid content .
